author: mpoeschl
msg: a patch for Turbine 2.1 that enables the use of Velocity service
within Turbine in a streamed mode as well as a streamed Layout
This patch makes it possible to embed servlet/JSP outputs into
a Velocity template used within Turbine.

author: mpoeschl
msg: - removed old changes doc and renamend changes_2_1 to changes
- added deprecation info to webmacro doc

author: mpoeschl
